mapper.select: SELECT ALARM_NO, ALARM_CONT, ALARM_CDATE, ALARM_RDATE, B.EMP_NM AS SEN_NM, C.EMP_NM AS REC_NM, ALARM_TYPE, ALARM_URL, ALARM_CHK, ALARM_SENDER, ALARM_RECEIVER FROM ALARM LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP B ON (B.EMP_CD=ALARM.ALARM_SENDER) LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP C ON (C.EMP_CD=ALARM.ALARM_RECEIVER) WHERE ALARM_RECEIVER = #{alarmReceiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ALARM_NO DESC
